verbs.description: [ARG1: The Iran nuclear accord] [V: was] [ARGM-NEG: never] [ARG2: wildly popular] [ARGM-LOC: in Congress] , but Trump ’s decision to withdraw from the pact gave it a boost among Democrats and even a few Republicans .
